attributes.action: Have a vote on removing Scotland from the United Kingdom
attributes.additional_details: Scotland would like independance most people in the United Kingdom would like to be rid of Scotland and the cost. This cost would be better used else where in the Union.
attributes.background: Give people in the United Kingdom the right to decided if Scotland should be allowed to remain in the United Kingdom.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The decision to leave the Union would be a matter for the people of Scotland based on their consent, rather than by a decision of the people of England, Wales and Northern Ireland.
